overview: Yeo-kyung was raised in a broken home without knowing the meaning of love. Believing marriage is the only option to escape her unhappy family, she marries her first love only to be disappointed when her marriage falls apart. She then meets Woo-chul and they develop a quick friendship that blossoms into love and their story becomes gossip for others, leading Yeo-kyung to question the path of their relationship.
title: Next Day of December
